replies.txt_content: 标题: AskyBlock的challenges刷屏问题完成[img]file:///C:\Users\Administrator\Documents\Tencent Files\3316974502\Image\Group\7VSXDW_R5_06L8HL7%@K@N2.png[/img]challenges的任务时会全服发布，重复完成的时候也会重复发布，如何把challenges发布消息取消

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content: 如果要不显示就打开config里面的   broadcastmessages: true设置为false

replies.txt_content: 如果你要显示正常就用Notepad++把语言文件转码为ANSI
